location.name: The Pit
location.description: Has two student-run stores that sell food. Place for Pit Smash but no permanent setups.

location.name: ECE Common Room
location.description: Engineering students (read: Stephen Dawe) play here often so it is populated. Melee is strongest here.

location.name: EngSci Common Room
location.description: To find the common room enter through the west entrance of the Bahen building, go up the stairs on your right and the common room is the transparent glass room behind you.

location.name: Chem Common Room
location.description: Found right in the center hallway of the second floor of Wallberg, take any entrance and a flight of stairs and it should be easy to find from there.

location.name: T1 Common Room
location.description: Enter from the front of SF and take the first two right turns, the T1 room is in the alleyway.

location.name: MSE Common Room
location.description: Spacious room with a CRT and holds almost all the smash games.

location.name: MP
location.description: Non-engineering location. To get here come in from the main entrance and take the stairs to the right. The astronomy club room should be open and to the right of the stairwell.

location.name: Chestnut Royale
location.description: Off campus location. The feens are running high even in res. Check out Chestnut and maybe find another person to study with?
